snippet.title: Orion Drift: Developer Snapshot 1
snippet.description:
Apply here for a chance at closed early access: https://discord.gg/OrionDrift

Orion Drift: Developer Snapshot 1

Lost in the depths of space, Orion Station drifts endlessly. You and your fellow robots were once Earth's premier athletes. Now, you must forge a new destiny among the stars.

Welcome to Orion Drift! We're excited to show you a glimpse of what we've been working on:
- Vast, seamless space stations that support up to 200 players, packed with activities
- Fluid movement: run, jump, climb, slide, skate, and fly
- Your heart-ball lets you play with friends anywhere
- Massive gatherings for games and events
- Extensive customization options to make your bot unique

From the innovative minds behind Gorilla Tag and Echo Arena comes a new era of social VR gaming. Your adventure in the stars begins soon!

#oriondriftvr #vr #metaquest
